channel.title: Posts on VK4MWL Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on VK4MWL Blog

item.title: First Post
item.description: Hi my name is Mike and I live in Brisbane Queensland. I have an interest in Amateur Radio, Electronics and working the IT industry. My call sign is VK4MWL, I enjoy making contacts on HF and working VKFF parks around Brisbane. This Blog will document some of my Amateur Radio activies and electronics projects.
